post.body: they're not on twitter, thank goodness. merry christmas btw!
yeah, it ends up really slow if you use them, although i like should_be_restful
I could start a power plant with how much coal i have
the giving tree clicking thing is srsly rigged
I celebrate Christmas as a nonreligious holiday and I'm a Christian..so a bit different I suppose
tell my wife that :(
http://ismerbrails.com/
that tree thing is rigged
I don't know how much longer I'll last! Must soldier on!
then I'm hanging out in the toilet in the fabric store, how is this better? ;)
watching driving miss daisy with my wife. first time i've seen it
dang, flood of stuff on the giving tree
Inlaws have the biggest tree I've ever seen in a house...and it's leaning
sitting up to 5 hours at the in-laws place....le sigh...i wonder if it's as much of a chore for other people as it is for me
sup dawg, we heard you like..ok, tired
scope leakage fixed, thanks
trying to win macheist apps, ughghghghg
hi @eshine ! :)
